mapper.insert:

insert into user (`name`, phone, `password`, city, openId, sessionkey, rd_session, lastLoginTime, historyList, avatarUrl) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rdSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{historylist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openId = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sessionkey = #{sessionkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rd_session = #{rdSession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastLoginTime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, historyList = #{historylist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarUrl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, phone, `password`, city, openId, sessionkey, rd_session, lastLoginTime, historyList, avatarUrl from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
